item.description:
Update - after the fireworks, we have reservations for Hei La Moon @ 7:45 pm. And after dinner, we will go to Shojo to ring in the New Year. Shojo is in Chinatown as well. You can call or text me if needed. 617-755-2147.

Don't want to go to a bar/club that cost $80 plus...or wait around till midnite for fireworks...then join us for fireworks and dinner. We will meetup to view the ice sculptures and then the fireworks on the Boston Commons. We will go to Chinatown for dinner after the fireworks. After dinner we will go to Shojo to countdown till midnite. There will be a cash bar and a DJ at Shojo and no cover charge.

Please be on time - meetup at 6:00 pm @ Dunkin Donuts (across from Boylston Street T stop - Green Line). The fireworks begin at 7 pm sharp. Dinner/restaurant TBA. 

If you already have plans, we wish you a safe & happy New Year's eve!

And as always, if your plans change please update your RSVP asap.
item.how_to_find_us: We will provide our cell phone to those that RSVP

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: NY's Eve - Fireworks, Dinner & Club
